class_notes: Course will be taught by visiting professor. Course topic may change depending on instructor, but 200 level Sociology course will be offered at this time during fall 2024. If course changes, enrolled students will be notified.
course_description: An examination of the nature, causes, and consequences of sex roles in our society, including how male and female roles are learned through socialization, and how they affect work and family.
sections: Class Nbr: 4127, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: OXF, Meets: MW 2:30-3:45p, Instructor: Staff, Status: Open
